maxDeposit.title: Maximum Deposit
maxDeposit.description: Optional maximum deposit amount to filter results.

productType.title: Product Type
productType.description: Indicates which financial product category the quote belongs to (Checking, Savings, CD, Loan). The agent can use this value to filter or summarize results.

stateAddress.title: State Address
stateAddress.description: Represents the state where the user is located or interested in. The U.S. state (e.g., Texas, California) or abbreviation (e.g., "TX", "CA") to filter quotes by branch location.
